text: Vampires Suck is a 2010 American parody movie directed and written by Jason Friedberg and Aaron Seltzer. It is a parody of Stephenie Meyer's series, Twilight. The movie was be released in North America on August 8, 2010, August 26, 2010 in Australia and October 15, 2010 in the United Kingdom. Vampires Suck achieved $4 million at the box office. == Ratings == Vampires Suck gained strong negative reviews: * Rotten Tomatoes - 3% * Metacritic - 21% out of 100% * IMDB - 3.8 out of 10 ==References== == Other websites == *Official Vampires Suck website Category:2010 movies Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Vampires Suck
